Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Technically \Tech"nic*al*ly\, adv. In a technical manner; according to the signification of terms as used in any art, business, or profession. [1913 Webster]
technically adv 1: with regard to technique; "technically lagging behind the Japanese" 2: with regard to technical skill; "a technically brilliant solution"
